metadata.title: CVE-2024-40958 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netns: Make get_net_ns() handle zero refcount netSyzkaller hit a warning:refcount_t: addition on 0; use-after-free.WARNING: CPU: 3 PID: 7890 at lib/refcount.c:25refcount_warn_saturate+0xdf/0x1d0Modules linked in:CPU: 3 PID: 7890 Comm: tun Not tainted 6.10.0-rc3-00100-gcaa4f9578aba-dirty#310Hardware name: QEMU Standard PC (i440FX + PIIX, 1996), BIOS 1.15.0-104/01/2014RIP: 0010:refcount_warn_saturate+0xdf/0x1d0Code: 41 49 04 31 ff 89 de e8 9f 1e cd fe 84 db 75 9c e8 76 26 cd fe c6 05b6 41 49 04 01 90 48 c7 c7 b8 8e 25 86 e8 d2 05 b5 fe 90 <0f> 0b 90 90 e979 ff ff ff e8 53 26 cd fe 0f b6 1RSP: 0018:ffff8881067b7da0 EFLAGS: 00010286RAX: 0000000000000000 RBX: 0000000000000000 RCX: ffffffff811c72acRDX: ffff8881026a2140 RSI: ffffffff811c72b5 RDI: 0000000000000001RBP: ffff8881067b7db0 R08: 0000000000000000 R09: 205b5d3730353139R10: 0000000000000000 R11: 205d303938375420 R12: ffff8881086500c4R13: ffff8881086500c4 R14: ffff8881086500b0 R15: ffff888108650040FS:  00007f5b2961a4c0(0000) GS:ffff88823bd00000(0000)knlGS:0000000000000000CS:  0010 DS: 0000 ES: 0000 CR0: 0000000080050033CR2: 000055d7ed36fd18 CR3: 00000001482f6000 CR4: 00000000000006f0DR0: 0000000000000000 DR1: 0000000000000000 DR2: 0000000000000000DR3: 0000000000000000 DR6: 00000000fffe0ff0 DR7: 0000000000000400Call Trace: <TASK> ?     Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-40958` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
